body:
Comment 1: 
I suspect the problem here is the value of your GOROOT variable. I think you have
GOROOT='c:\gowin-env', but it needs to be either GOROOT='c:\\gowin-env' (remember how
bash treats '\') or GOROOT='/c/gowin-env'.

I was surprised to discover, that I use 2 different GOROOT settings myself:

1) GOROOT=c:\gowin-env when I use Windows prompt;
2) GOROOT=/c/gowin-env when I use mingw prompt.

Not sure it is right thing to do. Perhaps there is something here that needs to be done.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**._ _Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
